scripts.adb-all: adb devices | tail -n +2 | cut -sf 1 | xargs -I {} adb -s {}
scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundleRelease: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable- && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.apkRelease: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/build/intermediates/res/merged/release/ && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable- && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.clean-cache: rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache
scripts.clean:android: rm -rf android/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && rm -rf ~/.gradlew/caches
scripts.android-reverse-ports: adb reverse tcp:8097 tcp:8097 && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.build:ipa: xcodebuild -workspace ios/BillingBee.xcworkspace -scheme BillingBee -configuration Release clean archive -archivePath build/BillingBee.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/BillingBee.xcarchive -exportOptionsPlist ios/exportOptions.plist -exportPath build/ipa
scripts.gradlew_build_error: rm -rf node_modules/@react-native/gradle-plugin && yarn install && rm -rf ~/.gradle/caches/modules-2 ~/.gradle/caches/transforms-* ~/.gradle/caches/build-cache-* && rm -rf android/app/build android/.gradle android/build && cd android && ./gradlew clean assembleDebug --info
scripts.clean-ios-build: cd ios && xcodebuild -project BillingBee.xcodeproj -scheme BillingBee clean && cd ..
